title: If You Were a Potion
subtitle: A reflective personality test to discover your dominant brew across eight forces: calm, courage, focus, charm, tempo, insight, resolve, and wonder.

dimensions.label: Tempo
dimensions.description: How quickly you commit and move

dimensions.label: Insight
dimensions.description: How you read patterns, people, and meaning

dimensions.label: Resolve
dimensions.description: How firmly you hold your boundaries and goals

dimensions.label: Wonder
dimensions.description: How much you chase beauty, novelty, and possibility
